import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import Rating from "../Rating"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import LoadingHex from "../LoadingHex"; import MessageBox from "../MessageBox"; import {productInfo} from '../../actions/productActions'; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails const {small, medium, large, Xlarge, main_image, name, price, rating, description, numReviews} = product const dispatch = useDispatch() const productId = props.match.params.id const [amountInStock, setAmountInStock] = useState(0) const [size, setSize] = useState("") const [stock, setStock] = useState(0) const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const [sizeSelected, setSizeSelected] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { dispatch(productInfo(productId)) setAmountInStock(product.small + product.medium + product.large + product.Xlarge) }, [dispatch, productId]) const addToCartHandler = () => { props.history.push(`/cart/${productId}?qty=${qty}`) } return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} :
Back

{name}

${price}

{description}
{ amountInStock > 0 ? In Stock : Sold Out }
{ amountInStock > 0 ? ( <>
{size.length > 0 ? : }

QTY
) : (
)}
}
) } export default ProductScreen
